name: Shiva
description: A beer brewn to honor the gods in a mysterious land called Siam.

name: Hikari
description: From a slumbering little town 'Hikari' in Japan, this beer has a mysterious, sweet taste.

name: Mandaloen
description: The colour can maybe shiver the most experienced drinker but the taste is totally worth it.

name: Analicious
description: A real Flemish beer with the taste of raspberries.

name: Bestone
description: Once there was a Korean brewer who was not only a woman but also used mango as an ingredient for the beer called 'Bestone'.

name: Magicale
description: Magicale. A rare beer with rainbow extract, its samapName that the taste is so sweet and great that even the old and the new gods crave it.

name: Snorson's ale
description: This beer goes back to the roots of brewing, it's so strong you even grow a moustache after just one zip.

name: Butt
description: Don't get shocked by the name of this beer.As it has a strange name and an unordinary smell, it tastes just sublime.

name: Parsendune
description: PARSENDUNE, when the grasp of a coarse hand plucks the sturdy grasshalms that sting and skimp the silky skin of the thighs, the parson curses and drags his habit around in total agony until his mind illuminates. What if he ordered the monks of the abbey to clear a pathway for him through the obstructive dune jungle. And so it came to be that every month a small procession of monks came all the way from Brugensis to secure a pathway to the parson's small chapel at the shoreline.Eventually when the monks returned with bloodsmeared hands and painful feet, brother Cuthbert consmapNameered their tremendous effort and sighed.Months had gone by and not one monk in the abbey still volunteered for this most exhausting task at the stormy shore of the Flanders county.Moodily Cuthbert lays his head to rest, soon to fall into the dizzying vertigo of his dreams.Shuddering he awakes to a vision.A vision of monks slaving away in a salted steam bubbling in copper cauldrons the size of a bursting bull.Uneasily he removes the remaining dunesand from his weary eyesockets and with a sudden twist of his tongue realises that mysterious cauldron is his very mouth with salty steam pouring out of his nostrils.The smell of pickled herring, the fresh dunegrass and the struggle to scrape together the money for the restauration of the old chapel, it must be hmapNameden clues to the divine will! The beerbrewery which has been abonded decades ago now standing as a beacon of hope ammapNamest the arrogant aristocrats preying upon the abbey, seeking to acquire it from the few grubby monks that remain in its enclosure.Foolish sinners they are, swearing and cursing that they shall turn it into a palace of vice for their lustful mistresses.However, Cuthbert sees his fate crumbling into a pathway foaming with golden threads spun of drunken memories and as the brother shivers with excitement he pledges to himself to make the abbey great again.Parsendune shall be the name that will be sung along with our Lord's fame, in every tipsy tavern across the county, passing the Word from sip to lip. Skol!

name: Hua Zai
description: The name 'Hua Zai' is a popular name for a boyfriend in China. It also tastes as sweet as love.

name: Power
description: An old recipe for a beer which replenishes your strength after a hard day at work.

name: Natural delight
description: Natural Delight. It contains a bit of Hibiscus which as a lot of health benefits, but is not recommended to consume too much of it, as it can reduce fertility. However, the crimson tint of the Hibiscus flower adds a nice red tint to the beer.

name: Maxxi
description: This beer is made with an extract of bear meat. It sounds pretty unusual but this old, Asian recipe for beer gives you the strength of a bear.

name: Xylem
description: Xylem. When the abbey was taken over by the Nights of the Early Age, the monks were forced to hmapNamee in the forest. Here, they accmapNameently mixed their beer recipe with resin from the trees. This was caused by trees leaking their flumapNames in to the beer-reservoires from the monks. The monks discovered that the resin from the trees gave a unique flavour to their beer. When the Early Age war was over, they went back to the abbey where they started production of their beer with their special recipe. After a while, they also discovered that the beer has a special influence on the warriors that drank the beer . The men who drank it, would become as strong as a tree.

name: Evato
description: A beer that taste like the freedom. They say this beer will make you elevate, or they just drank too much.

name: Bobo
description: The original recipe of this fruity beer, was actually a recipe for medicine. Cheers!
